# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it could be equally valuable to you. We are offering it to you at a special price of $20000. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. We look forward to hearing your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
